name: Downwordly
summary:
Downwordly is a word building game that challenges you to make the most out of the letters you have. Not all letters you see are playable! Use your intellect to find the best word you can make while also planning for the future.
Play against your GameCenter friends in turn-based multiplayer!
Play solo with an endless stack of letters!
Try searching for words in Puzzle mode!
Work your way through a new set of 5 layers of tiles every day in the Daily Challenge!
See how you stack up against your friends and the world on the leaderboards.
